title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH (Table Header), selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. The expected behavior is that selecting 'Add Javadoc' should add the Javadoc to the field. It is recommended to either remove this menu option or fix the issue so that it adds the Javadoc.
OB: Selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu on a field in TH does not result in any action.
EB: From the context menu on a field in TH, selecting 'Add Javadoc' should add the Javadoc to the field.
SR:
- Open the Table Header (TH) context menu.
- Select 'Add Javadoc' from the menu.
- Verify that the Javadoc is added to the selected field in the TH.
